name: CertifAir
goal:
Respect of the French law on air pollution in school.
Mesure Air pollution and radioactivity.
Transfer all the best practices in Air.
Develop game with children and teachers in order to increase the knowledge in Air pollution.
Innovative research in Air control system
Solutions in PM 2,5 for indoor pollution.
ISO standard in Air Pollution inside AFNOR organization.
euInitiatives: Environnement. Clean air act. Particules PM pollution in cities. Moisture in building.
